lines.text: Alright, you've got two choices, do you wanna talk?
I'm what you call a realist - the only real thing is me.
Imagine a machine feeling compassion for humans.
You're a cyborg! You lied to me!
[Uri, the leader of a gang of cannibals, to a woman tied to a cross]
I believe beauty can only truly be appreciated through *taste*.
You want me to take off my pants?
